views.name: Road Nodes
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Node'; }

views.name: Road Links
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link'; }

views.name: One Way
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.restriction === 'One Way'; }

views.name: No restriction
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.restriction === 'No Restriction'; }

views.name: Motorways
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Motorway'; }

views.name: A Roads
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'A Road'; }

views.name: B Roads
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'B Road'; }

views.name: Minor Roads
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Minor Road'; }

views.name: Local Streets
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Local Street'; }

views.name: Alleys
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Alley'; }

views.name: Pedestrianised Streets
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Pedestrianised Street'; }

views.name: Private Roads - Publicly Accessible
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Private Road - Publicly Accessible'; }

views.name: Private Roads - Restricted Access
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.term === 'Private Road - Restricted Access'; }

views.name: Dual Carriageways
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Dual Carriageway'; }

views.name: Single Carriageways
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Single Carriageway'; }

views.name: Slip Roads
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Slip Road'; }

views.name: Roundabouts
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Roundabout'; }

views.name: Traffic Island Links
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Traffic Island Link'; }

views.name: Traffic Island Links At Junctions
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Traffic Island Link At Junction'; }

views.name: Enclosed Traffic Area Links
views.lambda: function (type, feature) { return type === 'Road Link' && feature.nature === 'Enclosed Traffic Area Link'; }
